about_the_game:
Scrap Bastion is a shoot ’em up RTS game, based on the Bullet Hell era classics. You will collect and manage resources, fortifying your structures after each new enemy wave, with the most insane powers imaginable.

Time is crucial, and you’ll decide strategically how to proceed. Your enemies will evolve more and more to subdue you. Choose new fortifications as you level up, unlock weapons and buildings with new effects, and unique attacks to help you in combat.

scrap Bastion
Custom cities, with exclusive starting equipment and movement patterns;
Unique, powerful bosses, that will challenge you harder each time;
original soundtrack.

The pace is steady, but the stakes are high as the relentless hordes amass in an effort to overrun your mobile command center. will largely depend on dynamic action-based micromanagement skills. As you progress through the campaign airstrikes, charged attacks will become increasingly vital and their strategic deployment will be paramount.

Mistakes will not go unpunished, so stay cool, learn from your mistakes, and hang in there to fight another day. Without pain there is no gain!



  • ---------------------

Test Your Skills

  • ---------------------

The battlefield is an unforgiving landscape and every second counts. Beginners will find forgiveness in normal mode, while veterans will be drawn to the challenge of hard. When you are ready, it's time to test your skills in nightmare and survival.

  • -------------------------------------------

How Long Can You Hold Off the Hordes?

  • -------------------------------------------

  • ---------------------------

Burn, Explore and Obliterate

  • ---------------------------


Deploy the machine gun to destroy your enemies. Upgrade your towers with experimental upgrades to change their firepower and give unique changes to their projectiles.
15 buildings to create
17 turrets to combat the enemy
and 30 upgrades!

  • -----------------------------

Investigation towards victory

  • -----------------------------

  • ---------------------------------------------

The Meat Spawn Must Be Eradicated!

short_description: Scrap Bastion is a strategy tower defense game where you manage your city, equipping it to survive the waves of mutant creatures, testing your planning and decision making capacities at every turn. Watch out, as time is crucial to win!
